lead_paragraph: Jan Ullrich of Germany won the 11th stage of the Giro d'Italia yesterday, while Ivan Basso increased his overall lead. Ullrich completed the 31-mile individual time trial ending in Pontedera, Italy, in 58 minutes 48 seconds as the 21-stage race resumed after a rest day. Basso held an overall lead of 2:48 over Spain's José Gutierrez Cataluna.
